"Sending a "Thumbs-up"":
"There are far too many antisocial ARKS ops
out there these days. They hardly ever give a
salute to other members. But giving "Thumbs-up"
to your comrades is a hallowed tradition at
ARKS. Not only does it make the receiver
happy, there's something in it for you, too.
What could be better than that?"

"昨今は、無愛想なアークスが多い！
他のアークスに対するグッジョブ！
忘れてはならない交流手段だぞ！

送信するだけで相手は喜び
自分にとっても得のある
すばらしい行為なのだぞ！

いいか、私もグッジョブを……"
"任意の人にグッジョブを送信する"
